name: py-boltons
description:
When they're not builtins, they're boltons. Functionality that should be
in the standard library. Like builtins, but Boltons. Otherwise known as,
"everyone's util.py," but cleaned up and tested.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
